patents.title: Advanced Solar Cell Technology with Quantum Dots
patents.abstract: A novel photovoltaic cell design that increases efficiency by 25% through innovative semiconductor layering and quantum dot integration. The invention addresses current limitations in solar energy conversion.

patents.title: AI-Powered Medical Diagnostic System
patents.abstract: Machine learning algorithm for early detection of cardiovascular diseases using non-invasive imaging techniques. Provides 95% accuracy in diagnosis within 30 seconds.

patents.title: Autonomous Vehicle Navigation System
patents.abstract: Advanced LIDAR and computer vision system for autonomous vehicle navigation in complex urban environments. Reduces accident risk by 90% compared to traditional systems.

patents.title: Quantum Computing Error Correction Method
patents.abstract: Revolutionary quantum error correction algorithm that maintains quantum coherence 10x longer than existing methods. Enables practical quantum computing applications.

patents.title: Biodegradable Plastic Alternative from Seaweed
patents.abstract: Environmentally friendly plastic substitute made from processed seaweed that biodegrades within 90 days. Maintains strength and flexibility of traditional plastics.
